snippet: “Rabid: A Cultural History of the World’s Most Diabolical Virus” makes you feel that rabies must be truly diabolical if you can be infected by the bite of a book.
abstract: Mandatory anti-rabies vaccination program for dogs in the United States and other developed countries is one of the great historic successes in public health; about 55,000 people continue to die each year of rabies in countries without such mandatory vaccinations.
lead_paragraph: “Rabid: A Cultural History of the World’s Most Diabolical Virus” makes you feel that rabies must be truly diabolical if you can be infected by the bite of a book.

headline.seo: Searing Narrative of Rabies, and the Desperation to Forget It
headline.main: A Searing Narrative of Rabies, and the Desperation to Forget It
headline.print_headline: A Searing Narrative of Rabies, and the Desperation to Forget It
